Hero.title: Premium {accent} & Snacks
Hero.description: Exceptional quality mangoes, papayas, passion fruit, specialty crops, and premium snacks—direct from Ghana and Kenya via our Spain hub to European distributors and retailers.

papaya.name: Papayas
papaya.specs: Medium size, Sweet flesh, Optimum ripeness

passion-fruit.name: Passion Fruit
passion-fruit.specs: Premium grade, High acidity, Fresh pulp

avocado.name: Avocados
avocado.specs: Perfect ripeness, Creamy flesh, High yield

cocoa.name: Cocoa Beans
cocoa.specs: Fermented, High cocoa butter, Fine flavor

fusion.name: Mango-Pineapple-Coconut Fusion
fusion.description: Premium blend of dried mango strips, pineapple chunks, and coconut pieces. No added sugars, organic certified.

bars.name: Fruit Bars
bars.description: Portable energy bars in Mango, Passion Fruit, Papaya, and Coconut varieties. Perfect for on-the-go nutrition.

balls.name: Fruit Balls
balls.description: Energy-dense, naturally sweet fruit balls. Perfect blend of tropical flavors in convenient bite-sized portions.
balls.variants: Plain, dark chocolate, milk chocolate, white chocolate

rolls.name: Fruit Rolls/Leather
rolls.description: Chewy fruit leather with natural flavors. Mango, Pineapple, and mixed varieties available.

cubes.name: Fruit Cubes
cubes.description: Bite-sized naturally sweet fruit cubes. Perfect for snacking or mixing. Mango, Papaya, and blends.

headers.fresh_desc: Premium tropical fruits and specialty crops sourced directly from our partner farms in Ghana and Kenya. Exceptional quality, consistent supply, transparent sourcing.
headers.value_added_desc: Premium processed fruits and snack products. Available for direct purchase or as white label options for retail and food service partners.

header.title: Our Export Portfolio
header.description: Three product categories spanning fresh exports to high-margin value-added goods, all backed by operational mastery and market data.

papayas.name: Papayas
papayas.description: Fresh & processed; Green papaya segment rising in EU

mangoes.name: Mangoes
mangoes.description: Premium varieties; High demand in Germany & UK

passion.name: Passion Fruit
passion.description: Exclusive exotic; €88M EU imports, Netherlands hub

cocoa.name: Cocoa
cocoa.description: 70% of African world supply; Value-added processing focus

shea.name: Shea Butter
shea.description: EU organic market growing; Cosmetics & food grade

superfood.name: Superfood Powders
superfood.description: Cocoa, mango, banana powders; Health-conscious EU buyers

dried.name: Dried & Concentrated
dried.description: Dried mango, pineapple concentrate, papaya chips

cta.title: Ready to Source Premium African Exports?
cta.description: Whether you're a distributor seeking reliable supply, an investor exploring growth opportunities, or a tech partner enabling transparency - we have a portfolio for you.

header.title: Let's Partner
header.subtitle: Select your partnership type to get started. We work with distributors, retailers, food service, and brand partners across Europe.

distributor.title: Bulk Fresh Produce
distributor.subtitle: For Distributors & Wholesalers
distributor.description: Volume pricing, consistent seasonal supply, logistics coordination, and dedicated account management.

retailer.title: Fresh & Snack Products
retailer.subtitle: For Retailers & Supermarkets
retailer.description: Direct supply of fresh produce and branded snacks with co-branding and shelf-space opportunities.

foodservice.title: Custom & White Label
foodservice.subtitle: For Food Service & Brands
foodservice.description: Custom snack products, branded packaging, bulk production, ingredient customization, and co-development.

header.title: Our Competitive Advantages
header.description: Six pillars setting us apart: precision, partnership, technology, and impact.

ground_to_gate.title: Ground-to-Gate Precision
ground_to_gate.description: Full traceability from farmland through processing to EU port. Digital twins, polygon geodata, and IoT sensors ensure transparency and compliance.

operational.title: Operational Mastery
operational.description: Industrial engineering expertise combined with agricultural heritage. Precision timing, logistics optimization, and waste minimization.

ecosystem.title: Local Partnership Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Deep roots in Ghana and Kenya with cooperative farming networks, local processors, and community relationships built on trust.

sovereignty.title: Farmland Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Proprietary farmland in both markets plus outgrower partnerships. Control over supply sources ensures consistency and quality.

tech_chain.title: Technology-Enabled Supply Chain
tech_chain.description: AI/ML optimization, IoT monitoring, blockchain ledgers, and predictive analytics. Speed and agility in a dynamic market.

impact.title: Impact Investing Framework
impact.description: Every shipment creates measurable impact: fair wages, community investment, environmental stewardship, and technology transfer.

step_1.title: Farm Source
step_1.desc: Precision farming with IoT; fair farmer contracts; quality protocols

step_2.title: Digital Record
step_2.desc: Blockchain traceability; EUDR compliance; Quality/ripeness data

step_3.title: Processing
step_3.desc: Solar-drying or value-add; Margin multiplier; Waste reduction

step_4.title: EU Market
step_4.desc: Premium pricing; Distributor partnerships; Impact reporting

header.title: Compliance & Technology Stack
header.description: Six-step flow from African farmland to EU market: geodata, digital twins, clean labels, blockchain, and impact verification.

port.title: EU Entry Ready
port.description: Full compliance at port of destination

monitoring.label: Monitoring
monitoring.benefit: Real-time farm health and growth tracking

analytics.label: Analytics
analytics.benefit: Optimization at every supply chain node

eudr.title: EUDR Compliant
eudr.desc: Every shipment is deforestation-free certified with blockchain proof of origin.

traceability.title: Traceability 100%
traceability.desc: Farm-to-table transparency verified through digital twins and blockchain ledger.

impact.title: Impact Measured
impact.desc: ESG outcomes audited and verified: farmer income, jobs, carbon footprint.

header.title: Export Market Opportunity
header.description: Real market data from FAO, CBI, and African Development Bank - showing why now is the time to scale African exports.

size.label: Global Market Size
size.sub: Tropical fruits 2025 - highest level to date

africa_value.label: Africa's Export Value
africa_value.sub: 12.5% of global market - fastest growing region

margin.label: Processing Margin
margin.sub: Value-added products vs. fresh fruit premium

regions.title: Fastest Growing Export Region
regions.desc: African tropical fruit exports growing 36% over decade, significantly outpacing Central America and Caribbean. Demand for African products at all-time high.

tariffs.title: Zero Tariff Advantage
tariffs.desc: EPA duty-free access to EU markets vs. competitors. Direct cost advantage enabling premium pricing or higher volumes.

processing.title: Processing Premiums
processing.desc: Value-added products (flours, powders, concentrates) command 50-100% premiums. Higher margins through backward integration.

scarcity.title: Supply Chain Scarcity
scarcity.desc: Red Sea routing issues and climate challenges create unit value premiums. Premium positioning for alternative sourcing.

header.title: Join the Trade Bridge
header.description: Whether you source premium African exports, invest in growth, or enable technology - we have an opportunity for you.

distributors.title: For Distributors
distributors.desc: Access premium African tropical fruits with guaranteed traceability and seasonal supply planning.

investors.title: For Investors
investors.desc: Participate in high-growth export opportunity with measurable impact and transparent operations.

tech.title: For Tech Partners
tech.desc: Integrate your traceability, AI, or supply chain solutions into our platform.

form.title: Get in Touch
form.success: Thank you! We'll be in touch within 24 hours.

header.title: From Farm to Table
header.description: Our commitment to quality begins at source. We partner directly with African farmers, employ rigorous quality controls, and leverage technology to ensure transparency and freshness.

partnerships.title: Farm Partnerships
partnerships.description: We work with carefully selected family farms and agricultural cooperatives in Ghana and Kenya. Direct relationships ensure quality, fair pricing, and sustainable practices.

quality.title: Quality Selection
quality.description: Rigorous selection at source. Every product is inspected for optimal ripeness, color, flavor, and food safety standards. We maintain meticulous documentation.

cold_chain.title: Cold Chain Management
cold_chain.description: From farm to European port, our cold chain infrastructure ensures peak freshness. Temperature-controlled storage and rapid transport maintain product integrity.

traceability.title: Traceability & Compliance
traceability.description: Full digital traceability from farm to delivery. EUDR compliance, phytosanitary certifications, and organic verification where applicable.

commitment.title: Our Transparency Commitment
commitment.description: Every product comes with verifiable sourcing data. Know the farm, the farmers, and the journey of every fruit. Our digital traceability system provides complete visibility from harvest to delivery—because quality matters, and so does knowing where your food comes from.

Footer.brand_desc: Premium tropical fruits and snacks from Ghana and Kenya, delivered fresh to European markets. Fair trade, transparent sourcing, exceptional quality.

header.title: The Bridge Concept
header.description: Three markets, one vision: connecting Africa's agricultural potential with Europe's market demand through operational excellence.

heritage.title: Agricultural Heritage
heritage.description: Grounded in local farmland, backed by experienced African partners in Ghana and Kenya.

tech.title: Technology Integration
tech.description: Digital twins, blockchain traceability, EUDR compliance, and precision agriculture.

impact.title: Impact Investing
impact.description: Deploying best practices as a vehicle for sustainable economic transformation.

values.mastery: Mastery through precision and local expertise
values.solidarity_desc: Strong local partnerships built on trust

header.title: Scaling Strategy
header.subtitle: A phased approach from pilot to global export leader, backed by industrial excellence and high-growth markets.

phase_1.title: Phase 1: Operational Bedrock
highlights: Secure 500ha high-yield land in Ghana & Kenya
Deploy IoT sensor network & Digital Twin base
Achieve full EUDR & Global GAP certification

phase_3.title: Phase 3: Market Dominance
highlights: Expansion to Ivory Coast & Senegal hubs

header.title: Market Intelligence & Data
header.description: Evidence-based scaling driven by FAO data, CBI insights, and African Development Bank projections.

growth.title: Tropical Fruit Market Growth (CAGR)
growth.desc: Global demand for premium tropical exports is outpacing traditional commodities, with Africa leading regional growth.

eu_market.title: EU Market Penetration
eu_market.desc: The European Union remains the world's most robust premium market, with structural duty-free advantages for EPA regions.

seasonal.title: Seasonal Demand Premium
seasonal.desc: Strategic supply timing from Ghana and Kenya hits EU market peaks during scarcity windows in other regions.

epa.title: EPA Duty-Free Advantage
epa.desc: Kenya and Ghana benefit from Economic Partnership Agreements, providing 0% duties vs. 15-20% for some MFN competitors.

climate.title: Climate Resilience
climate.desc: Diversity of growing zones across East and West Africa provides a natural hedge against localized weather patterns.

logistics.title: Logistics Agility
logistics.desc: Our Spain hub acts as a decoupling point, allowing for just-in-time delivery and rapid QA before final distribution.

white_label.title: White Label Explosion
white_label.desc: EU retailers are increasingly seeking direct-from-source snack partners to ensure transparency and margin.
